name: A Maze In Space
description:
Controls:

  • Movement: WASD, shift, right ctrl, mouse, *spacebar*, xbox controller, other gamepads were not tested but might work
  • Left click to spawn cubes
  • middle click and right click are just visuals

Hints:

  • Follow the music and get the power up to unlock a new ability and reach your goals
  • Let go your earthly tether. Enter the void. Empty, and become wind
  • Q to quit
